code: import React,{createContext,useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{observeAuthState,signInWithGoogle,emailSignIn,emailSignUp,logout}from'../services/auth';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext({user:null});export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const unsub=observeAuthState(u=>{setUser(u||null);setLoading(false);});return()=>unsub();},[]);const value={user,loading,signInWithGoogle,emailSignIn,emailSignUp,logout};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:value,children:children});};export function useAuth(){return useContext(AuthContext);}
